name: deviceManagement_UpdateServiceNowConnections
description: Update the navigation property serviceNowConnections in deviceManagement

$block: ServiceNow properties including the ServiceNow instanceUrl, connection credentials and other metadata.

$ul: **id**: The unique identifier for an entity. Read-only.
**authenticationMethod**: Indicates the method used by Intune to authenticate with ServiceNow. Currently supports only web authentication with ServiceNow using the specified app id.
**createdDateTime**: Date Time when connection properties were created. The value cannot be modified and is automatically populated when the connection properties were entered.
**incidentApiUrl**: Indicates the ServiceNow incident API URL that Intune will use the fetch incidents. Saved in the format of /api/now/table/incident
**instanceUrl**: Indicates the ServiceNow instance URL that Intune will connect to. Saved in the format of https://<instance>.service-now.com
**lastModifiedDateTime**: Date Time when connection properties were last updated. The value cannot be modified and is automatically populated when the connection properties were updated.
**lastQueriedDateTime**: Date Time when incidents from ServiceNow were last queried
**client-request-id**: Client request Id as sent by the client application.
**request-id**: Request Id as tracked internally by the service
**client-request-id**: Client request Id as sent by the client application.
**request-id**: Request Id as tracked internally by the service
